  16. (* The lexer generator. Command-line parsing. *)

  18. open Syntax

  20. ‌let ml_automata = ref false
  21. ‌let source_name = ref None
  22. ‌let output_name = ref None

  24. ‌let usage = "usage: ocamllex [options] sourcefile"

  26. ‌let print_version_string () =
  27.   print_string "The OCaml lexer generator, version ";
  28.   print_string Sys.ocaml_version ; print_newline();
  29.   exit 0

  31. ‌let print_version_num () =
  32.   print_endline Sys.ocaml_version;
  33.   exit 0

  35. ‌let specs =
  36.   ["-ml", Arg.Set ml_automata,
  37.     " Output code that does not use the Lexing module built-in automata \
  38.      interpreter";
  39.    "-o", Arg.String (fun x -> output_name := Some x),
  40.     " <file>  Set output file name to <file>";
  41.    "-q", Arg.Set Common.quiet_mode, " Do not display informational messages";
  42.    "-v",  Arg.Unit print_version_string, " Print version and exit";
  43.    "-version",  Arg.Unit print_version_string, " Print version and exit";
  44.    "-vnum",  Arg.Unit print_version_num, " Print version number and exit";
  45.   ]

  47. let _ =
  48.   Arg.parse
  49.     specs
  50.     (fun name -> source_name := Some name)
  51.     usage


  54. let main () =

  56.   let source_name = match !source_name with
  57.   | None -> Arg.usage specs usage ; exit 2
  58.   | Some name -> name in
  59. ‌  let dest_name = match !output_name with
  60.   | Some name -> name
  61.   | None ->
  62.       if Filename.check_suffix source_name ".mll" then
  63.         Filename.chop_suffix source_name ".mll" ^ ".ml"
  64.       else
  65.         source_name ^ ".ml" in

  67. ‌  let ic = open_in_bin source_name in
  68. ‌  let oc = open_out dest_name in
  69. ‌  let tr = Common.open_tracker dest_name oc in
  70. ‌  let lexbuf = Lexing.from_channel ic in
  71.   lexbuf.Lexing.lex_curr_p <-
  72.     {Lexing.pos_fname = source_name; Lexing.pos_lnum = 1;
  73.      Lexing.pos_bol = 0; Lexing.pos_cnum = 0};
  74.   try
  75. ‌    let def = Parser.lexer_definition Lexer.main lexbuf in
  76. ‌    let (entries, transitions) = Lexgen.make_dfa def.entrypoints in
  77.     if !ml_automata then begin
  78.       Outputbis.output_lexdef
  79.         ic oc tr
  80.         def.header def.refill_handler entries transitions def.trailer
  81.     end else begin
  82. ‌       let tables = Compact.compact_tables transitions in
  83.        Output.output_lexdef ic oc tr
  84.          def.header def.refill_handler tables entries def.trailer
  85.     end;
  86.     close_in ic;
  87.     close_out oc;
  88.     Common.close_tracker tr;
  89.   with exn ->
  90. ‌    let bt = Printexc.get_raw_backtrace () in
  91.     close_in ic;
  92.     close_out oc;
  93.     Common.close_tracker tr;
  94.     Sys.remove dest_name;
  95.     begin match exn with
  96.     | Cset.Bad ->
  97. ‌        let p = Lexing.lexeme_start_p lexbuf in
  98.         Printf.fprintf stderr
  99.           "File \"%s\", line %d, character %d: character set expected.\n"
  100.           p.Lexing.pos_fname p.Lexing.pos_lnum
  101.           (p.Lexing.pos_cnum - p.Lexing.pos_bol)
  102.     | Parsing.Parse_error ->
  103. ‌        let p = Lexing.lexeme_start_p lexbuf in
  104.         Printf.fprintf stderr
  105.           "File \"%s\", line %d, character %d: syntax error.\n"
  106.           p.Lexing.pos_fname p.Lexing.pos_lnum
  107.           (p.Lexing.pos_cnum - p.Lexing.pos_bol)
  108.     | Lexer.Lexical_error(msg, file, line, col) ->
  109.         Printf.fprintf stderr
  110.           "File \"%s\", line %d, character %d: %s.\n"
  111.           file line col msg
  112.     | Lexgen.Memory_overflow ->
  113.         Printf.fprintf stderr
  114.           "File \"%s\":\n Position memory overflow, too many bindings\n"
  115.           source_name
  116.     | Output.Table_overflow ->
  117.         Printf.fprintf stderr
  118.           "File \"%s\":\ntransition table overflow, automaton is too big\n"
  119.           source_name
  120.     | _ ->
  121.         Printexc.raise_with_backtrace exn bt
  122.     end;
  123.     exit 3

  125. let _ = main (); exit 0
